data.eml:eml: Two new species of genus Oecleopsis Emeljanov from China, with descriptions of female genitalia of five species (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Cixiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhi, Yan, Yang, Lin, Zhang, Pei, Chen, Xiang-Sheng (2018): Two new species of genus Oecleopsis Emeljanov from China, with descriptions of female genitalia of five species (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Cixiidae). ZooKeys 768: 1-17, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.768.24796, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.768.24796
